headline: Evergy's Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: EVRG misses Q4 EPS estimates but beats on revenues, posts higher full-year earnings and outlines 2026 guidance with steady growth targets.

raw.headline: Evergy's Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: EVRG misses Q4 EPS estimates but beats on revenues, posts higher full-year earnings and outlines 2026 guidance with steady growth targets.

headline: Stronger, Smarter Power Grid to Improve Reliability for 6,000+ Customers in Berks County
summary: A major upgrade to the electric grid is underway to bring more electricity to the region and support faster power restoration for more than 6,000 FirstEnergy Pennsylvania (FE PA) customers in Berks County.

raw.headline: Stronger, Smarter Power Grid to Improve Reliability for 6,000+ Customers in Berks County
raw.summary: A major upgrade to the electric grid is underway to bring more electricity to the region and support faster power restoration for more than 6,000 FirstEnergy Pennsylvania (FE PA) customers in Berks County.

headline: Scotiabank Maintains Sector Outperform on FirstEnergy, Raises Price Target to $56
summary: Scotiabank  analyst Andrew Weisel   maintains FirstEnergy (NYSE:FE) with a Sector Outperform and raises the price target from $55 to $56.

raw.headline: Scotiabank Maintains Sector Outperform on FirstEnergy, Raises Price Target to $56
raw.summary: Scotiabank  analyst Andrew Weisel   maintains FirstEnergy (NYSE:FE) with a Sector Outperform and raises the price target from $55 to $56.

headline: FirstEnergy 5-year spending plan jumps 30% to $36B, driven by transmission
summary: FirstEnergy is seeking a U.S. Department of Energy loan to pay half of a $2.5 billion gas-fired power plant planned for West Virginia.

raw.headline: FirstEnergy 5-year spending plan jumps 30% to $36B, driven by transmission
raw.summary: FirstEnergy is seeking a U.S. Department of Energy loan to pay half of a $2.5 billion gas-fired power plant planned for West Virginia.
